CREATE TABLE project_files (

UPDATE project_files SET file_content=decode('54686973206973206120746573742066696C6520636F6E74656E74','hex') WHERE file_id=2;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE project_files (
	file_id INT,
	project_name VARCHAR(255),
	file_content TEXT,
	created_at TIMESTAMP,
	PRIMARY KEY (file_id)
)

CREATE TABLE version_history (
	version_id INT,
	file_id INT,
	version_name VARCHAR(255),
	change_description TEXT,
	created_at TIMESTAMP,
	PRIMARY KEY (version_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES project_files(file_id)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
	user_id INT,
	username VARCHAR(255),
	email VARCHAR(255),
	created_at TIMESTAMP,
	PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE user_projects (
	project_id INT,
	user_id INT,
	project_name VARCHAR(255),
	created_at TIMESTAMP,
	PRIMARY KEY (project_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE project_permissions (
	permission_id INT,
	project_id INT,
	user_id INT,
	permission_type VARCHAR(50),
	created_at TIMESTAMP,
	PRIMARY KEY (permission_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES user_projects(project_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE project_files SET project_name = 'New Project Name' WHERE file_id = 1;
